actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to impose additional reporting requirements on committees reporting bills or resolutions involving violations of the Congressional Budget Act.

summary.text: Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to require committee reports on bills or joint resolutions of a public character to contain a statement of any violation of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 and specify any waiver of its provisions. Requires the Committee on Rules, when reporting a resolution waiving a provision of such Act, to include a statement of explanation on the necessity of such waiver.

titles.title: A resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to impose additional reporting requirements on committees reporting bills or resolutions involving violations of the Congressional Budget Act.
